availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
State of Kentucky
Fleming County Sct.
October Special Term 1862
At a Special Term of the Fleming County Court held on the 30th day of October 1862
Present the Honbl Leonard B. Cox Judge
This day William G. Fleming Sheriff of Fleming County Resigned his office of Sheriff; to take effect on the 10th day of November 1862.
Whereupon the Court appointed Ben Botts, Sheriff of Fleming County to fill the vacancy occasioned by the Resignation of said Wm G. Fleming

A copy Attest
Wm T. Dudley Clerk of the Fleming County Court

Fleming Co
Sheriff
Ben Botts
Com Issd Nov 4 1862
